casebody.data:
Rene Elena CARTER and Lee Jay Carter, Petitioners and Appellants,
v.
D.R.E. and Colleen Campbell, Respondents and Appellees. DA 18-0622 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: January 30, 2019
Decided: February 12, 2019

Affirmed in part. Reversed in part. Remanded for further proceedings consistent herewith.
